ygData.subject: Re: Questions? Answers?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ran into the same problem with my bard, I just had to get patchwork and from then on it was no problem. I was hunting in Misty Thicket also, which is
ygData.messageBody:
> > I have a question! Why does my level 5 bard keep
> dying? I just can't keep
> > her alive enough to get any experience to level.


I ran into the same problem with my bard, I just had to get patchwork
and from then on it was no problem. I was hunting in Misty Thicket
also, which is easier I think at that level. I could just run to the
wall gate and have the guards take care of the monster if I got into
trouble. I've leveled a few characters there, I think it's a great
place up until level 12 or so.
